title: My Ex-Boyfriends Fell in Love With Me - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Based on a Video Game   Female Protagonist   Love Triangles   Modern Day   Tsundere
author: Kang Hada
description: Hana Bom, the team leader of a small doorknob manufacturing company, collaborated with Woodrail, the No.1 company in the furniture industry. But...Woodrail’s director is her first love slash ex-boyfriend who she haven’t forgotten in 10 years, and the team leader is her worst ex-boyfriend! There can't be two ex-boyfriends in one office. Can she survive here? >
